snippet.title: Entropy Survivors Release Date Reveal - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Discover the release date for this bullet heaven roguelike from Moving Pieces Interactive and First Break Labs, revealed during the Convergence Games Showcase. Simultaneously control a powerful mech and a sharpshooting space frog and use outrageously creative abilities and powerful weapon customization. Save the universe in single player or 2-4 player online co-op! 

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2602030

#convergenceshow #indiegame
